title: Traffic Light Simulation
description: Create a component that simulates a traffic light with automatic transitions between red, yellow, and green states.

title: Search Input with Autocomplete
description: Build a search input that fetches suggestions from an API using throttling or debouncing and displays them in a dropdown.

title: Build an Accordion
description: Implement an accordion component that supports multiple items, toggle behavior, and optional single-open mode.

title: Infinite Scrolling List with Caching
description: Create an infinite scrolling list that fetches items in pages, displays loading indicators, and caches loaded data.

title: To-Do List with Local Storage
description: Build a to-do list with add, delete, update, toggle complete, and persist the list using localStorage.

title: Accessible Modal with React Portal
description: Create a modal using React Portal that supports escape key closing, focus trap, and outside click detection.

title: Image Upload with Preview
description: Build a file upload input that accepts images, validates type and size, and previews them before upload.

title: Custom Select Dropdown
description: Build a custom select component with dropdown options, keyboard navigation, and outside click to close.

title: Draggable Reorderable List
description: Implement a list that supports drag-and-drop to reorder items, without using external libraries.

title: Multi-Step Form (Stepper)
description: Create a multi-step form wizard with validation at each step and a final review before submission.

title: Digital Clock
description: Build a digital clock that displays the current time and updates every second.

title: Debounced Input Field
description: Create an input field that delays API calls using debounce on user typing.

title: Tabs Component
description: Create a reusable tabs component that switches between different content panels.

title: Stopwatch
description: Build a stopwatch with start, stop, reset, and lap recording functionality.

title: Scroll to Top Button
description: Create a button that appears after scrolling a certain distance and scrolls the user to the top when clicked.

title: Resizable Split Panel
description: Build a layout with two panels where the divider can be dragged to resize the panels.

title: Progress Bar
description: Implement a progress bar that animates and shows progress based on a numeric value.

title: Toast Notification System
description: Create a global toast system that can show success, error, and info messages with auto-dismiss and manual close.

title: Password Strength Meter
description: Create a password input that displays a visual strength meter based on complexity.

title: Dark/Light Mode Toggle
description: Implement a button to toggle between dark and light themes with state persisted in localStorage.

title: Dynamic Form Generator
description: Build a form that takes a JSON schema and dynamically renders the form fields with validation.

title: Multi-Step Form
description: Implement a multi-step form with Next and Back buttons, validation at each step, and a final review page.

title: Custom Calendar Date Picker
description: Create a calendar component that allows users to pick a date, with optional month navigation and disabled past dates.

title: Search with Highlight
description: Build a list filter with a search bar that highlights the matching text in the list items.

title: Tree View Folder Structure
description: Render a nested folder structure with expandable/collapsible nodes using recursion.

title: Drag-and-Drop Reorderable List
description: Build a list where items can be reordered using drag and drop without third-party libraries.

title: Star Rating Component
description: Create a star-based rating component that allows selection and hover previews.

title: Responsive Navbar with Hamburger Menu
description: Implement a responsive navigation bar that collapses into a hamburger menu on smaller screens.

title: File Upload with Preview
description: Build a file input component that previews selected image or PDF files before uploading.

title: Keyboard Shortcut Handler
description: Implement a feature that listens for specific keyboard shortcuts and triggers actions.

title: Custom Audio Player
description: Build an audio player with play, pause, volume control, and seek functionality using the HTMLAudioElement API.

title: Live Character Counter
description: Create a textarea component that displays the number of characters typed and a maximum limit.

title: Debounced Live Search
description: Implement an input that queries a mock API with debounce logic to avoid sending requests on every keystroke.

title: OTP Input Fields
description: Build a set of 6 input boxes for OTP entry with auto-focus, backspace, and paste support.

title: Basic Chat UI
description: Create a chat interface with a message input box, user messages, and auto-scroll to latest message.

title: Toast Notification System
description: Implement a toast system that shows temporary messages at the top or bottom corner and auto-dismisses after a timeout.

title: Virtualized List Rendering
description: Build a long list with virtualization to render only visible items based on scroll position without using external libraries.

title: Editable Table Rows
description: Create a table where each row can be edited inline and changes saved locally or via mock API.

title: Tab Navigation Component
description: Create a tabbed interface where each tab shows different content, and highlight the active tab.

title: Copy to Clipboard Utility
description: Implement a button that copies a string to the clipboard and shows a success message on copy.

title: Draggable Reorderable List
description: Implement a list where items can be reordered using drag-and-drop without third-party libraries.

title: Image Carousel
description: Build an image carousel with next/prev buttons and indicators, with auto-slide support.

title: Countdown Timer
description: Create a countdown timer that starts from a given time and updates every second until it reaches zero.

title: Resizable Split Panel
description: Create two panels that can be resized horizontally by dragging a handle in between.

title: Stepper Form Wizard
description: Build a multi-step form with Next/Previous navigation and form validation on each step.

title: Breadcrumb Navigation
description: Build a breadcrumb component that reflects the current route hierarchy with clickable links.

title: Collapsible Sidebar Layout
description: Create a sidebar that can collapse/expand with animation, preserving state across page refresh.

title: JSON Viewer Component
description: Render a JSON object in a collapsible tree-like view that supports nested structures.

title: Light/Dark Theme Toggle
description: Implement a theme toggle switch that switches between light and dark modes using CSS variables or context.

title: Responsive Navigation Bar
description: Build a navigation bar that shows a hamburger menu on smaller screens with slide-out animation.

title: Lazy Load Images
description: Build an image component that lazy-loads when it enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver.

title: Fullscreen Image Gallery
description: Create a fullscreen image viewer with navigation arrows, ESC to close, and thumbnail previews.

title: Custom Range Slider
description: Build a range slider with two thumbs to select a numeric range (min-max).

title: Sortable Table Columns
description: Build a table where columns can be sorted ascending/descending by clicking on headers.

title: Custom Calendar Date Picker
description: Build a calendar component that allows date selection and shows the current month view.

title: Network Status Indicator
description: Display a banner or icon when the app goes offline or comes back online using the navigator API.

title: Scroll Progress Indicator
description: Implement a progress bar at the top of the screen that fills as the user scrolls down the page.

title: Auto-Resizing Textarea
description: Create a textarea that dynamically resizes based on its content without scrollbars.

title: Virtualized List Component
description: Render a large list efficiently by only displaying visible items using windowing technique.

title: Emoji Reaction Picker
description: Build a floating reaction picker (like Slack) that lets users choose and toggle emoji reactions.
